  Manages an ArubaCloud VPC Peering.
---

---
page_title: "arubacloud_vpcpeering"
subcategory: "Network"
description: |-
  Manages an ArubaCloud VPC Peering resource.
---

```terraform
resource "arubacloud_vpcpeering" "example" {
  name       = "example-vpc-peering"
  location   = "example-location"
  tags       = ["tag1", "tag2"]
  peer_vpc   = "peer-vpc-id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema


### Arguments

The following arguments are supported:

#### Required

- `location` (String) VPC Peering location
- `name` (String) VPC Peering name
- `peer_vpc` (String) ID of the peer VPC to connect to

#### Optional

- `tags` (List of String) List of tags for the VPC Peering

### Attributes Reference

In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

#### Read-Only

- `id` (String) VPC Peering identifier



## Import

Aruba Cloud VPC Network Peering can be imported using the `vpcpeering_id`.

```shell
terraform import arubacloud_vpcpeering.example <peering_id>
```
